comments: I took American History with Kolp first term of my freshman year and he\'s still one of my favorite teachers . You have to work really hard to get good grades in his class but the class was the most interesting one I had.

Kolp is a difficult grader unless you know the material that he wants. yes he gives very few A\'s but they are possible. Key to his test since they are always blue book KNOW THE DATE ARTICLE WAS WRITTEN, WHO WROTE IT,and WHY IS IT IMPORTANT. you will write three papers aswell, one on a movie, one on a book, and one final essay about whole course.
Good overall teacher & definately knows his history. Very tough grader who gave very few A\'s. Reading the books so you can participate in class will help your grade.

He was a really genuine man, but his class was very difficult. there was a ton of reading, which is pretty typical for for history, but his tests and papers were very difficult too. He was energetic and nice, but only take the class if you can handle the work load.
